rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0001
rows.name:
Metsu's Devices are a real pain
in the Core Crystal.

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0002
rows.name:
Individually, we can take 'em
no problem... But there are so
many of them!

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0003
rows.name:
Can't you wrest control of them
from Metsu, Hikari?

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0005
rows.name: My Devices are a different class.

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0006
rows.name: Only Metsu can control the Gargoyles.

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0010
rows.name:
I bet you're happy that I'm finally
the useless one, right?

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0011
rows.name:
What? I have no idea how you got
that from what I said.

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0012
rows.name:
Look, if I used all my power I bet
I could take them all out, no problem!

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0013
rows.name: Well, why don't you just do that, then?

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0014
rows.name:
Haha. Look at you two, play-fighting
like old pals.

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0016
rows.name:
N-no, Your Majesty, I assure you
that's not quite what-

rows.label: campfev11_570_100_msg0017
rows.name:
If you could turn that wit on Metsu
and his Gargoyles, they wouldn't
stand a chance, eh?
